examples: It's perfectly normal to feel like this.
It's perfectly good as it is (= it doesn't need changing).
Está perfectamente bien como está (= no es necesario cambiarlo).
I thought he'd be upset, but he seems perfectly fine.
Pensé que estaría molesto, pero parece perfectamente bien.
You know perfectly well what I mean.
Sabes perfectamente a qué me refiero.
